name: Odd Key
description: What is this key for? You have no idea where you got it from, but you refuse to part with it because it could come in handy some day.

name: Dirty Clothes
description: The clothes that you have been wearing for the past however long. They smell pretty bad. You should probably go take a bath and change clothes.

name: Coffee
description: Delicious magical coffee that will never go cold or spoil. However, you can't bring yourself to drink it. What if you need something warm to drink later?

name: Cool Rock
description: A cool rock you found on the ground.
